pli-tv-bi-vb-pc80:2.1: The nuns’ rules and their analysis
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc80:3.1: The chapter on offenses entailing confession
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc80:5.1: 80. The training rule on lack of permission
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc80:6.1: At one time the Buddha was staying at Sāvatthī in the Jeta Grove, Anāthapiṇḍika’s Monastery.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc80:6.2: At that time the nun Thullanandā gave the full ordination to a trainee nun who had not been given permission by her parents and her husband.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc80:6.3: The parents and the husband complained and criticized her,
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc80:6.4: “How could Venerable Thullanandā give the full ordination to a trainee nun without our permission?”
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc80:7.1: The nuns heard the complaints of the parents and the husband.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc80:7.2: The nuns of few desires complained and criticized her,
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc80:7.3: “How could Venerable Thullanandā give the full ordination to a trainee nun who does not have permission from her parents and her husband?” …
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc80:7.4: “Is it true, monks, that the nun Thullanandā did this?”
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc80:7.7: How can the nun Thullanandā give the full ordination to a trainee nun who does not have permission from her parents and her husband?
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc80:7.8: This will not give rise to confidence in those without it …
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc80:7.9: And, monks, the nuns should recite this training rule thus:
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc80:8.1: ‘If a nun gives the full ordination to a trainee nun who has not been given permission by her mother and father or her husband, she commits an offense entailing confession.’”
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc80:9.4: … The nun who has been given the full ordination by both complete Orders through a legal procedure consisting of one motion and three announcements that is irreversible and fit to stand—this sort of nun is meant in this case.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc80:10.2: the biological parents is what is meant.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc80:10.5: Who has not been given permission:
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc80:10.8: one who has trained for two years in the six rules.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc80:11.1: If, intending to give the full ordination, she searches for a group, a teacher, a bowl, or a robe, or she establishes a boundary, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc80:11.2: After the motion, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc80:11.3: After each of the first two announcements, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc80:11.4: When the last announcement is finished, the preceptor commits an offense entailing confession;
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc80:11.5: the group and the teacher commit an offense of wrong conduct.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc80:12.2: if she gives her the full ordination without knowing;
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc80:12.3: if she gives her the full ordination after asking them;
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc80:12.5: if she is the first offender.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc80:13.1: The tenth training rule is finished.
